summary: This appears to be an email forwarding an addendum document related to the Epstein case, sent from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to another recipient, with the subject referencing a file named 'epstein addendum 10 30.pdf'.
keyFacts: An email dated August 28, 2008, forwards an addendum related to the Epstein case.
The email is sent from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to another recipient, but the names are not provided in the visible text.
The subject references a file named 'epstein addendum 10 30.pdf', indicating it is an addendum document in the Epstein case.
